evidence.claim: Linchpin utilizes AWS for hosting and serverless computing.
The company follows HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange.
Linchpin implements FHIR for interoperability in health applications.
They use Kafka for stream processing and real-time data integration.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations is highlighted in their security documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
